xml.metadata:
xnbData: target: "w" compressed: true hiDef: true readerData: - type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.DictionaryReader`2[[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.String, mscorlib, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]]" version: 0
- type: "Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Content.StringReader" version: 0
numSharedResources: 0
content: #!Dictionary<String,String>
xml.p: name: Spirit's Eve #!String
conditions: Town/2200 2350 #!String

set-up: spirits_eve/-1000 -1000/farmer 12 54 1/changeToTemporaryMap Town-Halloween/loadActors Set-Up/advancedMove Maru true 0 2 2 0 0 3 -11 0 0 -7 5 0 0 2 4 0/advancedMove Alex true -4 0 4 4000 4 0 4 5000/advancedMove Jas true 1 1500 4 1000/advancedMove Pam true 0 1 1 5000 0 -1 1 5000/advancedMove Shane true -7 0 0 2 2 9000 0 -2 7 0 4 9000/advancedMove Demetrius true 3 18000 4 3000/addTemporaryActor Skeleton 16 32 30 59 2 false Monster/advancedMove Skeleton true 0 1 3 4000 2 0 0 -1 4 2000 -1 0 3 1000 2 2000 0 -1 4 4000 -1 0 0 1 2 5000/addTemporaryActor Skeleton 16 32 35 58 2 false Monster/playerControl halloween #!String
Abigail_spouse: You'll have to tell me what's beyond, I can't go on... spiders...$s #!String
Leah_spouse: I may have had a little too much pumpkin ale... #!String
Maru_spouse: I'm confused... you go on ahead and let me figure this out. #!String
Penny_spouse: Oh... These vapors... Hmmm... You look nice tonight.$l #!String
Haley_spouse: I get scared easily... I think I'm just going to stay right here.$s #!String
Sebastian_spouse: It would be interesting to have one of these on the farm. #!String
Sam_spouse: Hey, I was wondering when you'd show up!$h #!String
Harvey_spouse: Hi... I was hoping you'd find me here...$l #!String
Elliott_spouse: Mmph... I believe I've eaten a few too many slices of pumpkin pie. #!String
Abigail: I can't go on... spiders...$s #!String
Robin: Well, winter's almost here. It's a great time to stockpile wood and stone. #!String
Demetrius: I haven't seen Maru in hours... I hope she's alright. #!String
Maru: I think I've already been this way... no, wait...$s#$e#I'm lost...$s #!String
Sebastian: I have no idea how these skeletons are walking... creepy.#$e#It's pretty cool though. #!String
Pierre: ?? #!String
Caroline: I get scared very easily. I'll leave the haunted maze to the younger people. #!String
Linus: Good show, old friend. #!String
Alex: There's something weird over there. But how do I get to it?#$e#There's gotta be a secret passage somewhere around here. #!String
George: Hmm... smoked turkey haunch? I guess this festival isn't all bad.$h #!String
Evelyn: I wish Gus would include a vegetarian option. Some zucchini skewers, maybe? #!String

Lewis: Good evening, @. Have you ventured into the haunted maze yet? It's quite spooky.#$e#That strange man who lives in the tower set it all up himself. He wouldn't let anyone near while he was working on it. #!String
Clint: One of my iridium-infused maces would make quick work of these things. #!String
Emily: Do you like the jack-o-lanterns? I carved them myself. #!String
Penny: The vapor from this cauldron... it's making my head spin, but I can't seem to leave...$u #!String
Pam: I'll come to any event with free grub! You won't see me in the haunted maze, though. #!String
Haley: Eek! I'm too scared.$s #!String
Jodi: Vincent's upset that I won't let him go into the haunted maze... but he's just a little boy! #!String
Kent: Hey, @. Nice evening, isn't it? #!String
Sam: That's odd... It's just a dead end up ahead.#$e#I could've sworn there was someone ahead of me when I went through the maze, though. Where'd they go? #!String
Leah: Mm, hi. Sorry... mouth full of blackberries. #!String
Marnie: Hi, @. Have you had a productive fall?#$e#It's starting to get quite cold... crops won't hold out for much longer. #!String
Elliott: Why, hello @. It's chilly, isn't it? #!String
Gus: It's a lot of fun to cook with pumpkin. Such an interesting fruit. #!String
Dwarf: You say it's raining up above? *gasp*#$e#Rain... It's almost mythical to us. Some of us live our entire lives without ever experiencing it. #!String
Wizard: The affairs of mundane folk matter little to me, but the elementals like a chance to see you up close.#$e#It was for them that I created this silly maze. #!String
Harvey: Oh! You found me...$8#$b#The truth is, I got too scared so I came here to hide. Don't tell anyone.$s #!String
Shane: Why is there no more pumpkin ale? #!String
Sandy: I heard it's raining back home. Is that why you came here?$h#$e#I kind of miss the rain, actually...$s #!String
Jas: But Aunt Marnie! I wanna go in the maze! I'm not scared!$s #!String
Vincent: Mother won't let me go in the maze. *sob*$s #!String
Marlon: Don't get too close to the cage. #!String
Leo: %Leo's unblinking eyes are glued to the screen. You're unable to get his attention. #!String
